componentDescription: Stylable text element supporting various typographic options

children.description: Accepts any element that can be rendered by React, like a string, number, or JSX.

heading.description: Specifies the heading level for the label.

isItalic.description: Determines if the label text should be italicized.

isStriked.description: Determines if the label text should have a strikethrough.

isUnderlined.description: Determines if the label text should be underlined.

size.description: Defines the font size of the label; can be a predefined size or a custom number value.

weight.description: Defines the font weight of the label.

[x: string].description: Allows any additional string-keyed properties to be passed.
